headline: RBC Capital Raises its Price Target on Verizon Communications Inc. (VZ) to $48
summary: Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) is included among the 10 Most Profitable Undervalued Stocks to Buy On February 3, 2026, RBC Capital raised its price target on Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) to $48 from $44 while maintaining a Sector Perform rating. The move followed Verizon’s fourth-quarter earnings beat. RBC pointed to the company’s turnaround plan, which centers […]
